pr_title: GEODE-8205: Feature flag unsupported Redis commands

timeline.bodyText:
We should also add some security meta data here:
@ResourceOperation(resource = ResourcePermission.Resource.DATA, operation = ResourcePermission.Operation.MANAGE);
timeline.author: jdeppe-pivotal

timeline.bodyText: For consistency with other cli-related functions we should extend CliFunction instead of implements Function. That class exposes an execute that just needs to return a CliFunctionResult. CliFunction also extends InternalFunction which is more secure (it cannot be user-invoked in any way - for example via gfsh).
timeline.author: jdeppe-pivotal

replies.bodyText: I updated it, let me know what you think.
replies.author: sabbey37

timeline.message:
GEODE-8205: Feature flag unsupported Redis commands

Added log message and redis --enable-unsupported-commands gfsh command.

GEODE-8205: Feature flag unsupported Redis commands

Added log message and redis --enable-unsupported-commands gfsh command.
Adds command type back to unsupported command error message
